The Directors

Pastor Allan Kiombe

Director

We founded this as a platfrom to show family love to the less fortunate children. Our aim is to bring up a beautifully crafted generation of God fearing Children.

We are bounded in love. And we help raise our children to the purpose that God wants them to achieve. We empower them academically and economically.

Pastor Vivian Kibeu

Programs Coordinator

Our Mission

We provide

Love

We extend God's love to our children and make the children feel a sense of belonging.

Education

We make sure that our children are motivated to pursue their dreams.

Shelter

We dont just provide a house, but a home.

Food & Medication

We raise a healthy and happy generation.
